description:
Do you want to increase your affiliate sales? Or maybe are you interested in becoming a professional sales copywriter?

If so, this is the course for you!

ABOUT THIS COURSE

==================

You will learn:

  • How to use the secret sales letter template that allows me to consistently get amazing conversion rates
  • The magic words that will force your prospects to click on the "Order" button.

  • The attention-grabbing techniques you can use to create powerful email subject lines. Say goodbye to unopened emails forever!

  • How to use powerful hidden emotional triggers to manipulate your prospects’ subconscious into buying your product

  • And much, more more!

NOTE

=====

You do not need to have the writing skills of a modern-day Shakespeare to join this course! I can promise you that, even if you flunked English in high school, you will be able to craft amazing sales letters in no time.

============================

Dear student,

Five years ago, when I first started working as an Internet marketer, I was spending hours trying to write the perfect sales letter. And then, after clicking on that “Send” button that would send it to my list, I would wait nervously for the sales to come in. But minutes and then hours passed and no one on my list was ordering the products I was selling. The worst part was that it seemed that everyone else seemed to make money on the Internet, except me! I was confused, sad and even angry.

In the following years, I was lucky enough to meet and work for some of the best people in the business, first as a regular copywriter and then as a sales copywriter. And not only did I learn from these successful marketers, I also came up with techniques that allowed me to create the perfect sales letter - the sales letter that automatically boosts the conversion rates of whatever you’re selling by 10, 20, 30% or more!

I have spent 5 years of my life analyzing what makes a great sales letter. I have tested and re-tested hundreds of letters before finding a template that maximizes your profits every time. This is what I am going to teach you in this course.

Nicolas Henrion
title: Learn How to Write Compelling Sales Letters
